SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Asset
Represents a user's asset that is subject to zakat calculation.
AssetTypes
Enum representing the different types of assets.
Bank
Represents a bank entity with a name and a unique bank ID.
BankAccManager
Manages the creation and validation of bank accounts for users.
BankAccount
Represents a bank account associated with a user.
CardDBConnector
Handles saving card data to a file.
CardInfo
Represents the information associated with a credit or debit card.
CryptoZakatCalc
Strategy class for calculating Zakat on cryptocurrency assets.
DatabaseConnector
Responsible for handling database operations related to user data.
EmailValidator
Concrete validator class that validates the email during the sign-up process.
EstateZakatCalc
Strategy class for calculating zakat on estate assets.
GoldZakatCalc
Strategy class for calculating zakat on gold assets.
InvalidAssetExp
Custom unchecked exception thrown when an invalid asset is encountered during zakat calculation.
LoginOperation
This class implements the LoginService interface and serves as the core of the login operation using the decorator pattern.
LoginService
Defines the behavior for login operations.
LoginVerifier
Abstract decorator class for login verification.
Main
 
NameValidator
Concrete validator class that validates the name during the sign-up process.
PasswordValidator
Concrete validator class that validates the password during the sign-up process.
PasswordVerifier
Concrete decorator class that extends the login operation to verify the password.
Portfolio
Represents a user's portfolio of assets and provides functionality to add, edit, remove, and retrieve assets from persistent storage.
SignUpOperation
Handles the sign-up process for new users by validating input fields and storing user data using the DatabaseConnector.
SignUpService
Defines the contract for sign-up operations.
SignUpValidator
Abstract base class for validating different fields of a user during sign-up.
StockZakatCalc
Strategy class for calculating zakat on stock assets.
User
Represents a user in the system with an associated bank account.
UserData
Represents a user and their associated information.
UsernameValidator
Validates the username field during the sign-up process.
UsernameVerifier
Concrete decorator class that extends the login operation to verify the username.
ZakatCalcStrategy
Strategy interface for zakat calculation.
ZakatCalculator
Context class that uses a ZakatCalcStrategy to calculate zakat for a given asset.
ZakatCalculatorFactory
A factory class for creating instances of ZakatCalcStrategy based on the provided AssetTypes.
ZakatReport
Represents a report for calculating and tracking zakat owed on a user's assets.
